charges.charge_description: 21:846 CONSPIRACY TO POSSESS WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE MARIJUANA (1)

charges.charge_disposition: BOP for 30 months concurrent with sentence imposed in 1177-99, Bronx County Supreme Court, New York, and with credit for time served; supervised release for 60 months concurrent; $100 s/a; Court recommends dft participate in the BOP Residential Drug Abuse Treatment Program and be placed in an institution in northeastern United States to be near family. (1)

charges.charge_description: 21:846 CONSPIRACY TO POSSESS WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE MARIJUANA (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Supervised probation for 60 months with additional conditions and credit for time served; $100 s/a payable within 6 months; cash bond exonerated. (1)

charges.charge_description: 21:846 CONSPIRACY TO POSSESS WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE MARIJUANA (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Probation for 60 months with additional conditions and credit for time served; dft agrees to forfeiture of $2,132 in currency; $100 s/a; bond exonerated (1)
